io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule

Class ScheduleAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule.ScheduleAction

  • public class ScheduleAction
extends java.lang.Object
    A local interface for a schedule action. Schedule actions define the event that occurs when the parent schedule is triggered. Setter methods in this class will not have an effect on the Aurora.

    • Constructor Summary

      ScheduleAction()

                          int duration)
        Sets the brightness value and duration at the same time.
        Parameters:
        brightness - the brightness
        duration - the duration/transition between the previous brightness and the new brightness

      • getEffects

        public ScheduleEffects getEffects()
        Gets the optional effects object containing information about the effect being set. This only applies if an effect is actually being set.
